sentences.en: But did you honestly think we wouldn't notice?
sentences.cn: 但你真的认为我们不会注意到吗？

sentences.en: He never behaves honestly, nor wisely.
sentences.cn: 他的行为既不诚实, 也不聪明.

sentences.en: Honestly, I don't know anything about it.
sentences.cn: 真的，我对此事一无所知。

sentences.en: Honestly, Nev! Must you be quite so crude!
sentences.cn: 哎呀，内夫!你就非得如此粗俗吗！

sentences.en: I can't believe he got that money honestly.
sentences.cn: 我不相信他是靠正当手段弄到那笔钱的。

sentences.en: I honestly thought I'd seen the last of you.
sentences.cn: 老实说我以为再也不用见到你了。

sentences.en: I will say I honestly think, even at the risk of offending people.
sentences.cn: 即使有可能冒犯人,我也要说我真心所想的.

sentences.en: I'm paraphrasing but this is honestly what he said.
sentences.cn: 我是在转述，但这的确是他说的意思。

sentences.en: It came as a shock to hear an old friend speak so honestly about Ted.
sentences.cn: 听到一位老朋友如此坦率地谈起特德真让人大吃一惊。

sentences.en: It's important to answer her questions as honestly as you can.
sentences.cn: 尽可能如实回答她的问题非常重要。

sentences.en: Oh, honestly, I don't know what they will think of next.
sentences.cn: 噢，天哪，我真不知道他们接下去会想出什么来。

sentences.en: She fought honestly for a just cause and for freedom.
sentences.cn: 她为了正义的事业和自由而光明正大地斗争。

sentences.en: Tell me honestly, Kate, what do you think of John?
sentences.cn: 跟我说实话，凯特，你认为约翰怎么样？
我们开诚布公地谈了谈。

sentences.en: Well, honestly! They're like an old married couple at times.
sentences.cn: 哦，天哪！他们有时看起来真像一对老夫老妻。

sentences.en: You may scoff but I honestly feel I'm being cruel only to be kind.
sentences.cn: 你可能不以为然，但我真的认为我狠下心来只是出于一片好意。

sentences.en: You ought to examine yourself honestly and find out the source of your erroneous views.
sentences.cn: 你应该老老实实地反躬自省,找出你这些错误观点的根源.

words.tran_cn: 诚实的，实在的；可靠的；坦率的
